entities.name: granger
entities.description: Granger is referred to as the Mudblood girl. The text describes her as 'it's Granger!' indicating that she is a specific individual.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is mentioned as being caught at last, and Bellatrix shrieks in response to the news. This indicates that Potter is an important figure in the story.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is described as shrieking and attempting to touch the Dark Mark on her arm. She is also referred to as 'Bella' by Lucius, indicating a level of familiarity or intimacy.

entities.name: lucius
entities.description: Lucius is described as preventing Bellatrix from touching the Dark Mark and attempting to summon their master. He is also referred to as having lost his authority when he lost his wand.

relationships.description: Lucius prevents Bellatrix from touching the Dark Mark on her arm, indicating a level of control or authority over her.
Lucius mentions that Potter has been brought to his house, indicating that he is in possession of Potter and has the power to decide what happens to him.
